abstract: Clinical trials of the treatments, from Novartis and Genentech, showed they could lengthen lives.
snippet: Clinical trials of the treatments, from Novartis and Genentech, showed they could lengthen lives.
lead_paragraph: Two drugs can delay by several months the time before advanced breast cancer worsens, potentially providing new options for women with that disease, researchers reported Wednesday.

headline.main: Two Drugs Appear to Delay Progression of Breast Cancer
headline.print_headline: Two Drugs Appear to Delay Progression of Breast Cancer
